name: theologically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the study of religion and religious belief: The church, with more than 16 million members, is politically and theologically conservative. I became more traditional theologically than my family and more radical politically. See
theological
More examplesFewer examplesI don't think any of the guys here agreed with him theologically.I am afraid that, theologically, you are wrong. We would consider them to be theologically liberal.
